EmptyViewHelper - Class in eu.davidea.flexibleadapter.helpers
Helper class to show an empty view when Recycler View has no items.
EmptyViewHelper(FlexibleAdapter, View) - Constructor for class eu.davidea.flexibleadapter.helpers.EmptyViewHelper
Constructor to initialize both empty data view.
EmptyViewHelper(FlexibleAdapter, View, View) - Constructor for class eu.davidea.flexibleadapter.helpers.EmptyViewHelper
Constructor to initialize both empty views: Empty data and empty filter result.
EmptyViewHelper(FlexibleAdapter, View, View, EmptyViewHelper.OnEmptyViewListener) - Constructor for class eu.davidea.flexibleadapter.helpers.EmptyViewHelper
Constructor to initialize both empty views: Empty data and empty filter result with an extra level of callback for more customization.
